description: Ensure the posted request will not delete or modify an existing Custom Account Posting Rule Type.

Integration_Worktag_Mapping_DefinitionOb.description: Display information used to describe an instance of an object. This 'optional' information is for outbound descriptive purposes only and is not processed on inbound Workday Web Services requests.

The unique identifier type. Each "ID" for an instance of an object contains a type and a value. A single instance of an object can have multiple "ID" but only a single "ID" per "type".  Some "types" require a reference to a parent instance.
Contains a unique identifier for an instance of an object.

description: Secured reference to the Mapping Table Definition.

validation.validation: You must select an output type of either Ledger Account or Worktag Type for your mapping definition.
You can't enter more than 10 primary worktags.
You must have an External Code in your Mapping Definition.
Enter a unique display name for each parameter.
Enter a maximum of 20 Input Parameters for a mapping table definition.

Mapping_Table_Definition_Data.description: The name of the Mapping Table Definition.

Mapping_Table_Definition_Data.description: Specifies the Mapping Table for the Mapping Table Definition. This field is read only and cannot be used to link a Mapping Table to a Mapping Table Definition.

Mapping_Table_Definition_Parameter_Data.description: Specifies the Order of the Parameter for the Mapping Table Definition.
Specifies the Name of the Mapping Table Definition.
Specifies whether to enable Wildcard functionality for the Mapping Table Definition Parameter.
Specifies whether Range Field is enabled for the Mapping Table Definition Parameter.

Mapping_Table_Definition_Parameters.description: Element containing data for a single Parameter of the Mapping Table Definition.

validation.validation: You may not select both Allow Wildcard and Range Field for the same parameter.

Mapping_Table_Definition_Data.description: Element containing all the parameters of the Mapping Table Definition.

validation.validation: Order must be unique for Parameter Data.
